channel.title: [FM] Yes, We Can’t Have Nice Things Because This Is A Clown Fiesta Sequel ENDGAME [3/22]
channel.description:
![v7fjcjl0kuz31|502x500](upload://5prrqk3QatZWRa5nP9QxPFvW1f4.jpeg)
# [color=fuck]Rules:[/color]
* Moderator 》@Geyde and @BenShapiro <small><small>and @DatBird </small></small>. Send all actions to us. * Respect 》Don’t be a dick. If you are going to rage, try to do it in your role pm instead of in thread. If you don’t know what’s in boundaries then ask the mod. * Quoting 》Don’t quote any messages from outside of the main thread (moderator messages, neighborhood chats, etc). * Spam 》Try to limit spam and excessive fluffposting in thread. * Angleshooting 》Avoid this at all costs. If an action by the mod or something OOG would cause an assumption on a player’s alignment, please inform the mod. * Weaponizing Mod 》This is extremely punishable. * Cheating 》This is extremely punishable. Don't cheat or looser * Alts 》 Allowed and discussion of identity is allowed. Contact @DatBird
# [color=fuck]Mechanics[/color]
* Cycles 》Days are 48 hours and Nights are 24 hours. If all players post to skip the night in their role pms, I will skip the night. * Boxing In 》Box ins are majority + plurality. There is a d1 box in. * Voting 》When voting please ping the mod. Otherwise I am likely to miss it. * Powers/Roles 》This game is a closed game with numerous elements that may lie to you. * Factions 》Town, Toxic Forumers, Balance Panel, White, Black, Radical Sandwich Anarchists, Cult, Legion of Stationery, Mafia, Texans, Generic Fantasy Elves, Consequentialists, Newbieists, Angles, Democrats, Enlightened Centrists, Skills Wallets * Anti-Claim 》There *are* anticlaim mechanics. * Why are you reading this 》<small>ɢeyde ɪndustries have denied any involvement with any instances of extremely frustrating concepts or ideas present in the setup.</small> * Flavor 》Flavor is NAI. * [Banana](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S-Eyhq-D9yM) 》<there is hidden text in the setup> * Balance 》Any mechanics that have been considered extremely bastard are in fact in this setup. * Events 》There are events. Inactivity in events will result in terminal velocity * Spells 》They are in game. Get fucked. * ITAs 》They exist. Get fucked.
## Players
1. ~~an_gorta_pratai~~ [color=nepurple]**Maya Fey**[/color] 2. ~~Arete~~ [color=black]**Black Knight**[/color] 3. ~~Icibalus~~ [color=red]**Lucifer**[/color] 4. ~~Marluxion~~ [color=white]**White King**[/color] 5. ~~Cantaloupe~~ [color=red]**:joy_cat:**[/color] 6. ~~Min~~ [color=green]**Acererak**[/color] 7. Cheeki 8. ~~KyoDaz~~ [color=white]**Matador**[/color] 9. Leafia 10. ATNoName 11. ~~Blizer~~ [color=green]**Jet Eriksen**[/color] 12. ~~ElithePsycho~~ [color=red]**Thomas Aquinas**[/color] 13. ~~Emilia~~ [color=gold]**Confucius**[/color] 14. ~~ClonedCheese~~ [color=red]**The Remainder of Our Originality**[/color] 15. ~~ElectraHeart~~ [color=purple]**Herobrine**[/color] 16. Mistyx 17. ~~Conduit~~ [color=green]**Dante from DMC**[/color] 18. ~~Vulgard~~ [color=blue]**Whatever the Fuck is up with Britain**[/color] 19. Amelia 20. Sulit hydra 21. ~~Arctic~~ [color=gold]**Rodin**[/color] 22. Light 23. ~~Mot (A)~~ 24. Strickland_Propane (A) 25. ~~HonkMan (A)~~ 26. SpecChat (A) 27. Jean_valJean (A) 28. ~~Oko, Thief of Crowns (A)~~ 29. ~~Eliza (A)~~ 30. Banana (A) 31. hamhamham (A)
And more?
## Backup <players>
1. Jane 2. Katze 3. Eevee (maybe) 4. Whysper 5. YBW 6. Derps
## Spectators (semi-informed) <players>
1. astand 2. Marshal 3. Some other people
# Threadmarks
[D1 Starts](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/7) [MORE ALTS](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/38) [Mist is a Gamer](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/195) [Arete is the Black Knight](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/222) [Diarhan Cast](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/294) [Red Capote Cast](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/525) [D1 Ends, Vulgard Skills Wallets Skills Wallets) / N1 Starts](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/2289) [D2 Starts, Arete Black Black Knight](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/2312) [ITA: Marl White Priest](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/2596) [ITA: ElectraHeart ERROR](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/2747) [JeanValJean Summoned](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/2955) [Emilia Stoned](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/fm-yes-we-can-t-have-nice-things-because-this-is-a-clown-fiesta-sequel-d2-17-28-22/85454/3585)
